subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mets outfielder Shawn Green worked on eliminating a hitch from his swing this winter in an attempt to get back to his 40-plus home run form. But so far this spring, he is hitless in 10 at-bats.
snippet: Mets outfielder Shawn Green worked on eliminating a hitch from his swing this winter in an attempt to get back to his 40-plus home run form. But so far this spring, he is hitless in 10 at-bats.
